summary: In this context, 8-epi-PGF2alpha is mentioned as a biomarker test solution that is nebulized and propelled through a ventilator, simulating tidal breathing. This process involves the exhaled breath, indicating a direct relationship between the measurement of 8-epi-PGF2alpha and respiration. The study aims to analyze volatile substances derived from exhaled breath, highlighting the significance of respiration in the assessment of this biomarker.
